attributes.action: Never to repeal the Hunting Act 2004
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Never again shall the unspeakable chase the uneatable

rejection.details:
You may prefer to sign this instead:
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/keephuntingact/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
